author: Josiah Bates
title: ‘We Feel Like All of Us Are Gonna Get Corona.’ Anticipating COVID-19 Outbreaks, Rikers Island Offers Warning For U.S. Jails, Prisons
description: Many activists, criminal justice reformers and health experts agree that the U.S. prison population is highly vulnerable to the virus
content: In her 19 years working on Rikers Island in New York City, one corrections officer tells TIME she has never seen anything like the chaos and uncertainty that the novel coronavirus is causing in the jail system. (TIME is choosing not to identify the officer, w… [+15806 chars]
